original_title: Applications to be called for the second phase of the Aswesuma relief in January
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The Ministry of Finance says that applications will be called for the second phase of the Aswesuma relief in January.
This is an increase of 29,932 compared to the  1.377 million beneficiaries in September.
The Ministry of Finance says that it expects to increase the number of beneficiaries of the Aswasuma social welfare program to 2 million.
The Ministry of Finance also says that it expects to select the most suitable team for that.
The government has allocated 205 billion rupees for the payment of the Aswasuma social welfare program in 2024.
